message: Let's be realistic, I reject your offer.  I propose a more reasonable split. This is a good deal, the money will be worth less next round.
Meet me in the middle, it's better for both of us.
Time is running out, and the money is losing value. I'm sticking to my previous proposal.  Take it or leave it!
Come on, let's compromise. We're both losing here.
This is my final offer.  Agree to this and we both walk away with something. Don't be greedy, Alice!
